Description of incident: Office was physically broken into and that two password protected laptops were stolen. The Sacramento County Sheriff’s Department was immediately called and promptly arrived at the office, investigating the matter. What Information Was Involved? This may have included : full name, birthdate, telephone number, address, Social Security number, all employment (W-2) and self-employment information, 1099 information (including account number if provided to my office), entity identification and income earned/amounts received from participation in S-Corp/partnership/LLC/trust, Affordable Care Act insurance data (your medical insurance policy number if you provided us with a Form 1095-A), and direct deposit bank account information (including account number and routing information if provided to my office).
